Title: Standard Pursuit
minimums: At least 1 Unit has Medium Range DMG value >= 1.
reqs: All Units must be Size 2 or smaller.
75% of Units must have a move of 12'' or higher.
effect: 75% of Group gets Blood Stalker for free.

Title: Probe Pursuit
minimums: At least 1 Unit has Medium Range DMG value >= 2.
75% of Units must have a move of 10'' or higher.
reqs: All Units must be Size 3 or smaller.
effect: 75% of Group gets Blood Stalker for free.

Title: Sweep Pursuit
minimums: At least 1 Unit has Short Range DMG value >= 2.
reqs: All Units must be Size 2 or smaller.
All Units must have a move of 10'' or higher.
effect: 75% of Group gets Blood Stalker for free.
